query: 如图,点P是平行四边形ABCD内一点,已知S~△PAB~=7,S~△PAD~=4,那么S~△PAC~等于()选项：['4', '3.5', '3', '无法确定']
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=DC,假设P点到AB的距离是h~1~,假设P点到DC的距离是h~2~,∴S~△PAB~=\frac{1}{2}AB•h~1~,S~△PDC~=\frac{1}{2}DC•h~2~,∴S~△PAB~+S~△PDC~=\frac{1}{2}(AB•h~1~+DC•h~2~)=\frac{1}{2}DC•(h~1~+h~2~),∵h~1~+h~2~正好是AB到DC的距离,∴S~△PAB~+S~△PDC~=\frac{1}{2}S~▱ABCD~=S~△ABC~=S~△ADC~,∵S~△PAB~+S~△PDC~=\frac{1}{2}S~▱ABCD~=S~△ABC~=S~△ADC~,即S~△ADC~=S~△PAB~+S~△PDC~=7+S~△PDC~,而S~△PAC~=S~△ADC~-S~△PDC~-S~△PAD~,∴S~△PAC~=7-4=3．故选:C．
